title: FS: Custom Made Wooden Storage Boxes
author: jbhofmann

posts.post_title: FS: Custom Made Wooden Storage Boxes
posts.post_content:
Hello!  I've been a lurker on here for some time but rarely post.  I love the site and get a great amount of information from it.  

I have some custom made Spalted Maple/Walnut boxes that fit approx. 40 BGS graded cards.  Therefore many more PSA should fit.  

[IMG]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7263/7019159061_caf17f96e6.jpg[/IMG]

If there is any interest I can possibly make something totally custom as well.  Contact me if you have any questions.

-Joel

I've talked to several people so far.  If you would like something that is totally custom, send me an email or PM.  If you can give me the dimensions of your storage needs I can ger a solution to you.
